titles: The reformation reform'd, or, A short history of new-fashion'd Christians occasioned by Franck Smith's Yesterdays paper of votes, September, 2. 1681.
author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to Roger L'Estrange. cf. NUC pre-1956.
